comment: Took a melatonin early last night and slept like a rock. Still feeling a little body sore this morning, but overall back to typical functioning! Grateful for manageable side effects, grateful to be only weeks away from fully vaccinated status!!

                  :time (e / early

                                    :mod (l / last)))))
            :op2 (s / sleep-01

                  :manner (r / resemble-01

      :snt2 (c / contrast-01

                        :mod (b / body)
                        :mod (l2 / little))

                  :mod (s3 / still))
            :ARG2 (b2 / back-02
                  :ARG1 ii2

                        :ARG1-of (t3 / typical-02))
                  :mod (o / overall)))
      :snt3 a
      :op1 (g / grateful
            :topic (e2 / effect-03
                  :mod (s4 / side)
                  :ARG1-of (m4 / manageable-03)))
      :op2 (a2 / appreciate-02
            :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
            :ARG1 (b3 / be-located-at-91

                  :ARG2 (a3 / away

                        :quant (m5 / multiple
                              :op1 (t4 / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 1
                                    :unit (w / week)))
                        :mod (o2 / only)))))
